Index » module » NavigationUI

Class: module.NavigationUI

Defined in: coffee/NavigationUI.coffee

Overview

Thin, generic wrapper for an interactive canvas / 3D element.

Examples:

customize in a subclass 

class ThreeDNavUI extends NavigationUI
  mouseWheel: (evt) ->
    super evt
    this.zoomOnWheel(evt)

Constructor

positions.

  • element ( DOMNode ) — the element to listen on / use to calculate
